title: I just bought a new ward and cat use it. Help
body: So on my other account, PrevailingLegend, I did my hex tech unboxing stuff and I got the rising dawn ward. To activate the ward you go to the shop and find your ward and activate it, but when i go to the shop i can't find the ward i bought. help me fix this pls. i wanna use it

replies.body: Looks like you solved the issue here, but yup, you are now able to select ward skins in champion select.

Did you already upgrade the shard to make it permanent?
If so then you have it.  
Ward selection is done during champ select now so maybe that's the issue?
ahhhh, know i see. thanks a lot buddy. :)

Why do you let your cat use your wards.
Or at least tell us how.
damn, ya got me. but pls. help me....

I seriously thought you wanted a refund on something because your cat bought it by sitting on your mouse or something LOL
